CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "xml" omit-xml-declaration = "no"/>
<xsl:template match = "/"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "InScopeProtocol"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match = "ProtocolSites/OrgSite"> <xsl:variable name = "link" select = "OrgSiteID/@cdr:ref"/> <xsl:variable name = "uri" select = "concat('cdrx:', $link, '/DocTitle')"/> <xsl:variable name = "sortKey"> <xsl:value-of select = "document($uri)/CdrDocTitle"/> </xsl:variable> <SortableSite key = "{$sortKey}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|comment()|*| processing-instruction()|text()"/> </xsl:copy> </SortableSite> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match = "ProtocolSites/PrivatePracticeSite"> <xsl:variable name = "link" select = "PrivatePracticeSiteID/@cdr:ref"/> <xsl:variable name = "uri" select = "concat('cdrx:', $link, '/DocTitle')"/> <xsl:variable name = "sortKey"> <xsl:value-of select = "document($uri)/CdrDocTitle"/> </xsl:variable> <SortableSite key = "{$sortKey}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|comment()|*| processing-instruction()|text()"/> </xsl:copy> </SortableSite> </xsl:template>
<!-- Pass-through template. --> <xsl:template match = "@*|comment()|*| processing-instruction()|text()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|comment()|*| processing-instruction()|text()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
